what_you_do: Suzanne B. Simpson is an author, therapist, coach, nutritionist, and facilitator dedicated to helping individuals achieve inner-heart healing and trauma release.
who_you_serve: Suzanne's target audience is faith-driven women seeking fulfilled and purposeful lives.
social_proof: Suzanne is a published author, licensed professional counselor, board certified coach, and qualified prophetic heart healing minister and HeartSync minister.
signature_programs: Suzanne has developed a unique approach that merges emotional liberation therapy with spiritual guidance.
business_focus: Suzanne's central mission is to help those experiencing hurt live healthy in mind, body, and spirit.
service_provided: Emotional liberation therapy, spiritual guidance, coaching, nutrition, workshops
